data: Dr. François Amet Dr. François Amet Duke University (Post-Doc, 2015) Stanford University (PhD, 2014) Ecole Polytechnique, France (MS, 2009) Ecole Polytechnique, France (BS, 2008) Research Interests Quantum transport in two-dimensional materials Low-temperature physics (superconductivity, quantum Hall effect, ballistic transport...)
